nominalLexeme: 1. A person who works on an aeroplane and who looks after the passengers, serving them food and drink, and helping them when they need it. English = flight attendant, flight steward, air-hostess.
2. A type of tapered cap, commonly worn by female flight attendants (air-hostesses) in the past.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: the shape of an air-hostess' cap.
